definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near
weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Able to reveal weaknesses in the structure in order to optimize the structure design.
sentences.chinese: 能夠揭示出結構的薄弱環節，以利於優化結構設計。

sentences.english: Hardness was quiet different in different zone of fusion welding joint.
sentences.chinese: 熔焊接頭硬度分佈不均勻，熱影響區是薄弱環節。

sentences.english: Defence has always been weak and vulnerable in the basket-ball matches in China.
sentences.chinese: 防守是我國籃球隊的一個薄弱環節。

sentences.english: How to practise evidence-based medicine(EBM) in clinic still remains a problem.
sentences.chinese: 循證臨牀實踐是當前循證醫學教育的一個薄弱環節。

sentences.english: The history of mathematics in Pre-Qin China is the weakest domain in the study of the history of mathematics in China.
sentences.chinese: 先秦數學史一直是中國數學史研究的薄弱環節。

sentences.english: The basic techniques concerned with passing, taking a pass and dribbling are the weakness in the real games.
sentences.chinese: 傳接球和運球基本技術在實戰運用中是薄弱環節。

sentences.english: Weekends are spent sharpening academic weak spots in paid tutoring sessions.
sentences.chinese: 週末得花錢上補習班，提高自己學習中的薄弱環節。

sentences.english: In sucker-rod oil pumping system, the sucker rod is its vulnerable spot.
sentences.chinese: 在有杆抽油系統中，抽油杆是其薄弱環節。

sentences.english: We must find the weak link in our work and then strengthen it.
sentences.chinese: 我們要找出工作中的薄弱環節，加強力量。

sentences.english: Also the hardened steel of the shaft pulling onto the mild steel of the frame is going to be a weak point.
sentences.chinese: 而且軸滴硬化鋼拉動框架滴軟化鋼將是一個薄弱環節。

sentences.english: The wall thickness of metal corrugated pipe is very thin, that is the weakest link in the piping system.
sentences.chinese: 金屬波紋管的壁厚很薄，它是管道系統中的薄弱環節。

sentences.english: The seal oil system has become weaker part for hydrogen cooled generator in running.
sentences.chinese: 軸封油系統已成爲氫冷發電機運行的薄弱環節。

sentences.english: But batteries remain the weak point.
sentences.chinese: 但是電瓶還是薄弱環節。

sentences.english: The labrum is a thin ring of cartilage that lines the acetabulum, or hip socket.
sentences.chinese: 在髖臼周圍的軟骨中，上脣是薄弱環節。

sentences.english: "Rebounding had been one of their weaknesses, " Hamblen said.
sentences.chinese: “在過去，籃板一直是他們的薄弱環節，”弗蘭克稱。

sentences.english: This is a disease that can take advantage of any weakness in the health infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 這種疾病可能利用衛生基礎設施中的一切薄弱環節。
